monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Arcane Barrage
skills.description: 10 x 65% (650%) magical damage (neutral) Shield self for 1 x (750 + 200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion
skills.description: 5 x 80% (400%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 100% (500%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Arcane Obliteration
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies Removes 2 Buffs from targets

skills.name: Arcane Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery (Buff)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (120 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Buffing Restore
skills.description: When applying a Buff, 50% chance that a Debuff is removed.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Channel
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Charging Shield
skills.description: Shield self for 60 when receiving a Charge stack.

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Concealed
skills.description: During its first round, this Monster has an additional 25% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Boon
skills.description: On Critical Hit, 50% chance to grant a random Buff to another random Monster in the party.

skills.name: Critical Buffs
skills.description: When applying a Buff, there is a chance to also apply 2 Charge stacks, equal to this Monster's Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Current
skills.description: Wind attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Edge
skills.description: Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gold Sense
skills.description: Increases Gold gained after combat by 10%. (If this Monster is participating in combat)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Conflux
skills.description: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Multi Sidekick
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Punishment
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an allied Monster removes a Buff from an enemy with an attack, there is a 50% chance the attack deals an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Quicken
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Agility & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Shieldcast
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Shieldcast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Shieldcast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel & Spellshield (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Shocking Current
skills.description: Every Wind attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Tailwind
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of Aerial Monsters in the party by 7%.

skills.name: Tornado
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, cannot be dodged Removes 1 Buff from targets

skills.name: Utopia
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Wind Allegiance
skills.description: Converts the element of all Neutral attacks to Wind. Wind attacks ignore Wind resistance.

drops.name: Craft Box
drops.description: Consume to get random craft materials based on Keeper Rank.
